snippet: Taiwan’s officers Chu Kung-hsun and Hsu Chang-kuo were returned in mid-October, and a Chinese spy imprisoned in Taiwan, Li Zhihao, was given early parole.
lead_paragraph: Taiwan’s officers Chu Kung-hsun and Hsu Chang-kuo were returned in mid-October, and a Chinese spy imprisoned in Taiwan, Li Zhihao, was given early parole.

headline.main: Exchange of Spies With China Is Positive Sign, Taiwan Says
